width.name: width
width.percentages: relative to width/height of containing block
width.animationType: by computed value type, recursing into fit-content()

height.name: height
height.percentages: relative to width/height of containing block
height.animationType: by computed value type, recursing into fit-content()

min-width.name: min-width
min-width.appliesTo: all elements that accept width or height
min-width.percentages: relative to width/height of containing block
min-width.animatable: by computed value, recursing into fit-content()

min-height.name: min-height
min-height.appliesTo: all elements that accept width or height
min-height.percentages: relative to width/height of containing block
min-height.animatable: by computed value, recursing into fit-content()

max-width.name: max-width
max-width.appliesTo: all elements that accept width or height
max-width.percentages: relative to width/height of containing block
max-width.animatable: by computed value, recursing into fit-content()

max-height.name: max-height
max-height.appliesTo: all elements that accept width or height
max-height.percentages: relative to width/height of containing block
max-height.animatable: by computed value, recursing into fit-content()

box-sizing.name: box-sizing
box-sizing.appliesTo: all elements that accept width or height
